rules_text: Whenever this creature attacks, if it's enchanted or equipped, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“Just quit if you face her. Her poison'll make you wish you could die.”
—Dyfed, veteran champion[/i]
notes:
(but fluffy, chantarelles aren't poisonous)
(uuuuhhhh veronian chantarelles are poisonous. canon now. look I just saw the art and wanted to use it but the only thing I had handy and fitting was this deathtouch onedrop, OK)
!Veronia
